artist: Engraver: Samuel Freeman; Painter: After Philip Mercier; Publisher: John Major
description: portrait, half-length of artist at his easel holding palette and brushes in left hand; wearing floral scarf/cap on head, loose black coat and white shirt; in a room with books on shelves behind him

Signature,Title, Date, and Inscription

below image in black: Se ipse pinx\'t   Freeman Sculp\'t / MERCIER / LONDON / Published by John Major 50 Fleet Street / Oct. 15, 1827 | in pencil on sheet: 2-55
title: Portrait of Philip Mercier
